alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of New London County through 1045 PM EDT... At 1003 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mystic, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Groton, Mystic, Waterford, Ledyard, Griswold, Lebanon, Preston, Lisbon, Sprague, Bozrah, Voluntown and Gales Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
